Package controller

Class ValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ValidatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    public class ValidatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validator
    This class represents validators which are used to validate user input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ValidationResult validateDate​(java.lang.String content)
      This method is used to validate date including invalid formats, weekend and future date.

      This method is used to validate name entered by the user.

      ValidationResult validateSymbol​(java.lang.String content)
      This method is used to validate the stock symbol.

      This method is used to validate username entered by the user.
      ValidationResult validateWeights​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Float> stocks)
      This method is used to validate the weights entered by the user.
